entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
